title: participation
comment: Sharing in actions or identifying with actions or people. All human beings share in Adam's fall and its consequences; believers share in Christ and his life.

children.title: participation, in sin
children.comment: The natural condition of all human beings as a result of sharing in Adam's fall. Believers are called not to associate with, nor give approval to wickedness but to stand apart from evil as God's holy people.

children.title: God's people are not to participate in evil
God's people are called to be holy

primaryrefs.comment: Too close an association with the nations round about, particularly in marriage, would cause Israel to compromise her unique relationship with God
Often related to marriage, this applies to all close alliances with unbelievers.

children.title: participation, in Christ
children.comment: The joining of believers to Jesus Christ, through faith, whereby they are freed from participation in Adam by sharing in Christ's death and resurrection, his nature, sufferings and glory and whereby, too, they become part of his body. Believers therefore share in the fellowship, ministry and hope of God's people, which is anticipated by the OT and fulfilled in the church.

children.title: Faith liberates from participation in sin

primaryrefs.comment: Paul thanks the Philippians for their active support of his ministry.

children.title: Participation of the nations in God's salvation
Gentiles are included among God's people
God's promise to include the nations
